column1: #Text=Asami says : " So much for our escorts . "
#Text=Korra says : " Maybe we should have brought everybody else . "
#Text=Gombo says : " Step away from the gold ladies and you wo n't get hurt . "
#Text=Korra says : " Sorry to disappoint you , but we 're taking this gold back to Ba Sing Se . "
#Text=Gombo says : " Aww , we love gals with spirit , suit yourself . "
